tool.name: Scater calculate cpm
tool.description: Calculate CPM from serialized scater R object
tool.help:
Usage: /Users/suhaib/miniconda/bin/scater-calculate-cpm.R [options]
Options: -i INPUT-OBJECT-FILE, --input-object-file=INPUT-OBJECT-FILE File name in which a serialized R SingleCellExperiment object where object matrix found
-s SIZE-FACTORS, --size-factors=SIZE-FACTORS A logical scalar indicating whether size factors in object should be used to compute effective library sizes. If not, all size factors are deleted and librarysize-based factors are used instead (seelibrarySizeFactors. Alternatively, anumeric vector containing a size factor for each cell, which is used in place ofsizeFactor(object).
-o OUTPUT-OBJECT-FILE, --output-object-file=OUTPUT-OBJECT-FILE File name in which to store serialized R object of type 'Scater'.'
-t OUTPUT-TEXT-FILE, --output-text-file=OUTPUT-TEXT-FILE File name in which to store CPM values.
